EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic and Citrix Synergy (1495128851.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Brian, I wanted to let you know that Turbonomic will have a booth at Citrix, Synergy and extend the invite for you to come and meet the team and see what is new with Turbonomic. Our booth is number 509 and my colleague AJ Fiore will be there for a majority of the weekend and would love to put and name to a face. Best regards, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]>
